Title: Kiragoorina Gayyaligalu
Writer: Agni Shridhar (dialogue), Agni Shridhar (screenplay), Poornachandra Thejaswi (novel)
Actors: Shwetha Srivatsav, Yogesh, Ajay Rao, Kishore Kumar G.
Plot: The movie depicts the indomitable feminine spirit in all its grandeur. Most importantly the role of women in countering the evils of society on a broad canvas of agrarian India.
